title: Jo's curried prawn couscous
ingredients: ['oil for frying', '250g frozen prawns', '2 teaspoons yellow curry powder', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '600ml (1 pint) vegetable stock', '350g couscous', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', 'Optional additions', 'cherry tomatoes, halved', 'red pepper, chopped']
